name: EmotiWorld
description:
3 Levels Demo Release avaliable - at this moments A1200 stock is the Recomended Machine

While our main development Cyberpunk Alien City takes its development time, we are going to create this little mini-game that is born like many others in the form of a tutorial on our YouTube channel and that we believe has the potential to entertain and at the same time is a development that can be approached in a while reasonable. I had the idea in 2017 but until now I had not brought it to fruition. Multi-level playable demo in progress. Greetings to our followers and thank you for your support, we greatly appreciate your support.

EmotiWorld V1.0 In development - created in Amos Pro. Game Design Johnny Acevedo Tileset : https://rekkimaru.itch.io/ Music : 1991 Nexus Emojis iconarchive.com
